backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with data models, maps for all entities, authorization and storage mixins, and decommission-state handling logic.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that resets users and initializes decommissioned=false when upgrading.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to the decommissioned frontend screen feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files and their roles in navigation, UI, notifications, and layout.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling hash-based routing, decommission status checks, and conditional rendering of pages.
frontend/src/assets/generatedAssets.ts: Exports constants for generated static asset file paths.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: UI view showing an access denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAuthE: UI view for admin authentication errors with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminModul: Routes admin module keys to their corresponding admin module components.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading, error, or denial views as appropriate.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/Adm: Reusable searchable data table component with configurable columns and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/Del: Confirmation dialog for delete actions with optional loading state.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/For: Displays a small error message with an icon for form validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/jobs/JobFo: Form for creating and editing jobs with validation, mutation handlers, and timestamp conversion.
frontend/src/components/admin/jobs/JobsL: Lists jobs with search, status display, editing, and deletion via a data table.
frontend/src/components/admin/media/Medi: Displays searchable and filterable media grid with preview and delete options.
Dialog showing image or PDF previews with download support.
Card for uploading media files with validation, progress tracking, and mutation integration.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Ba: Backup and security module view showing backup download and activity/login logs in tabs.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Da: Renders admin dashboard metrics and recent activity with refresh, loading states, and activity label mapping.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Jo: Provides job management UI with list, create/edit dialog, and form handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Me: Displays media upload card and media list for managing uploaded files.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Ne: Manages news articles with list view and create/edit dialog using NewsForm.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/No: Provides tabs for composing notifications and viewing notification history.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Re: Wraps the reports dashboard for viewing analytics and exporting data.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Sc: Handles creation and editing of government schemes with list and modal form.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Us: Manages users with list view, create/edit dialog, and a user details drawer.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/We: Displays and edits website settings with loading skeletons and logo picker dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/Featu: Dialog for selecting an image from media, with search, filtering, and selection state.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/NewsF: Form for creating or updating news items with validation, tag parsing, and featured image selection.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/NewsL: Displays a searchable list of news with edit, publish, and delete actions using data table and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/notificati: Form for composing and sending notifications to all users or selected users with validation and submission handling.
Shows past notifications with delivery status, recipient count, and timestamp, with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/admin/reports/Re: Dashboard displaying user and news statistics and providing CSV export for users and news data.
frontend/src/components/admin/schemes/Do: Dialog for searching and selecting document-type media items with temporary selection and filtering.
frontend/src/components/admin/schemes/Sc: Form for creating or updating schemes with validation and support for attaching documents via a picker dialog.
Displays a searchable list of schemes with edit and delete actions using admin scheme hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/A: Shows a table of admin activity logs with timestamps, principals, types, and details.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/B: Provides a card UI to trigger a full system backup download with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/L: Filters and displays admin login and logout events in a table format.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/L: Dialog for selecting an image from media items to update the website logo.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/W: Form for editing website settings including name, tagline, contact info, and SEO fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/users/User: Drawer showing detailed user info with role assignment and edit option.
Dialog for creating or editing users with validation and role selection.
Displays a searchable user list with actions for viewing, editing, toggling status, and deleting users.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that shows an error card and allows reloading the page when a runtime error occurs.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginFooter: Renders footer links and a copyright notice for the login screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/MemberLogin: UI-only member login form supporting mobile, OTP request, password login, and remember-me toggle.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Defines the dashboard structure with navbar, sidebar, and main content, handling both member and admin modes.
Shows dashboard home content including welcome info, profile progress, quick overview cards, and recent activities.
Top navigation bar with search, notifications, user menu, identity display, and logout handling.
Displays quick links and a list of announcements with priority badges in a right-side dashboard panel.
Renders a collapsible sidebar with user or admin menu items and handles navigation state.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: A button showing a bell icon that triggers opening notifications and displays unread count.
Sliding notification panel that lists user notifications, supports marking read, and handles escape/overlay closing.
Error boundary that suppresses errors inside the notification panel and renders nothing on failure.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Displays the logo image with size options and a fallback placeholder if loading fails.
Footer showing branding, support contact, copyright, and attribution link.
Page layout wrapper providing main content area and footer.
frontend/src/components/site/TextLogo.ts: Renders the text-based SMART JANGHAI logo with size and color variants.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/dashboard.ts: React query hooks for fetching dashboard metrics, recent activity, and monthly growth via actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/jobs.ts: React query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting jobs while keeping job data fresh.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/media.ts: React query hooks for listing, uploading, and deleting media, including upload progress support.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/news.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, create, update, publish, and delete news items using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/notifications.t: Implements hooks to create notifications and fetch notification history, invalidating related queries on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/schemes.ts: Defines hooks for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting schemes via backend actor operations.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/security.ts: Offers hooks to fetch sorted admin activity logs and to export backend backup data as a downloadable JSON file.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/settings.ts: Contains hooks to fetch and update website settings, refreshing cached data after updates.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminAuth.ts: Provides hooks to get the caller's role and admin status with caching and controlled refetch behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/users.ts: Supplies hooks to manage users including fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and modifying roles or status.
frontend/src/hooks/notifications.ts: Includes hooks for fetching a user's notifications and marking notifications as read, keyed by user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useExampleNotificatio: Empty placeholder file for future notification-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider with login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder exporting nothing for future query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemStatus.ts: Fetches system decommission status by probing backend availability and interpreting specific error messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light and dark modes, and custom utility classes including glassmorphism and soft shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard inside an admin route guard using the shared dashboard layout.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Provides an Internet Identity–based admin login UI and redirects to the admin dashboard upon successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Displays a static notice indicating the website has been permanently decommissioned.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main landing page with a hero section, notifications, category cards, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/MemberLoginPage.tsx: Renders the member login page with background image handling, branding, and a login card component.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user dashboard using the shared dashboard layout in non-admin mode.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthError.ts: Normalizes backend authorization errors to user-friendly messages and detects admin-related auth failures.
frontend/src/utils/hashRouting.ts: Implements simple hash-based routing utilities for parsing, generating, and updating page hashes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query strings.
frontend/src/utils/userRole.ts: Contains helpers for identifying admin roles and converting UserRole values to readable labels.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings including radii, shadows, fonts, and keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state describing decommission-related features and requests, including a frontend decommission screen and backend decommission/data‑wipe requirements.
